rows.label: qev041101_MSG0001
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_JNK0010
rows.name: Verify

rows.label: qev041101_SEL0011
rows.name: Check to see if Zazazan is alive.

rows.label: qev041101_JNK0020
rows.name: Scout

rows.label: qev041101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ignore Zazazan's body and search the area.

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0002
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0003
rows.name: Is that...[ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0004
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0005
rows.name: ...Harvey and others left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0006
rows.name: Zazazan played dead. Fooled Harvey like charm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0007
rows.name:
Scum started shooting Zazazan in back, then took off
with nopopotamus and entire inventory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0008
rows.name: Please! Friend must help Zazazan get goods back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0009
rows.name:
If contents of shipment used for evil purposes,
results could be terrible...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_JNK0030
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev041101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask which way Harvey and his men went.

rows.label: qev041101_JNK0040
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev041101_SEL0041
rows.name: Demand to know what Zazazan was transporting.

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Friend aims to fight them? Very impressive!
Humans all seem to be terrible bunch,
but friend is clearly different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Seems like Harvey headed for cave up ahead.
Not too long has passed, so friend should be able to
catch up and give them sound thrashing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0012
rows.name:
Zazazan cannot say. But it is something Nopon need
in order to survive on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0013
rows.name: Please believe Zazazan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Zazazan overcome with gratitude. Remember, though,
Harvey and others are armed with weapons friend
brought them. Be careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0015
rows.name:
Friend returned! Please get that shipment back,
whatever it takes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0016
rows.name:
If contents of shipment used for evil purposes,
results could be terrible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_JNK0050
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev041101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask which way Harvey and his men went.

rows.label: qev041101_JNK0060
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev041101_SEL0061
rows.name: Demand to know what Zazazan was transporting.

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0017
rows.name: Friend aims to fight them? Very impressive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0018
rows.name:
Seems like Harvey headed for cave up ahead.
Not too long has passed, so friend should be able to
catch up and give them sound thrashing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0019
rows.name:
Zazazan cannot say. But it is something Nopon need
in order to survive on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0020
rows.name: Please believe Zazazan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0041
rows.name:
Zazazan overcome with gratitude. Remember, though,
Harvey and others are armed with weapons friend
brought them. Be careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0021
rows.name:
Harvey stole nopopotamus of Zazazan and headed for
cave up ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0022
rows.name:
Friend needs not hold back at all.
Give that scum beating of lifetime![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Zazazan is glad to see friend back safe!
...So then? What of the shipment?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0024
rows.name:
Oh-ho-hooo! Zazazan saved! If that shipment was lost,
Zazazan would have been ruined.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0025
rows.name: Oh, and the nopopotamus?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_JNK0070
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev041101_SEL0071
rows.name: Say that it sided with Harvey, so you killed it.

rows.label: qev041101_JNK0080
rows.name: Regret

rows.label: qev041101_SEL0081
rows.name: Offer an apology for killing it without thinking.

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0026
rows.name: ...Killed? As in dead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Hmm... Well, no helping it now, but Zazazan not able
to carry this much by himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0028
rows.name: Is there chance friend could bring it back to New LA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Zazazan not blame friend for fighting back, but...
Hmmm. This is tough one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Zazazan not going to be able to carry this much by
himself. So if friend is blaming [ST:gender p1=himself p2=herself ] at all for this,
maybe [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] could bring shipment back to New LA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0031
rows.name:
These goods extremely important, but Zazazan trust
friend. But whatever happens, do not peek inside![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0032
rows.name:
...Friend is clear on this? Absolutely no peeking!
None! Meh-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0033
rows.name:
Also, if flunky of elder named Loma asks about
shipment, just dodge the question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0034
rows.name:
Loma is same as Harvey. So sneaky!
Aims to take goods of Zazazan for himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev041101_SEL0091
rows.name: Take Zazazan's words to heart.

rows.label: qev041101_JNK0100
rows.name: Suspect

rows.label: qev041101_SEL0101
rows.name: Given the shady errand, ask to hear more about Loma.

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0035
rows.name:
Friend is a kind, sparkly, USEFUL human!
Nothing like jerkface Harvey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0036
rows.name:
Loma is right-hand Nopon of elder in New LA.
Sneaky thief always trying to steal goods of Zazazan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0037
rows.name:
If Loma finds out friend is carrying shipment for
Zazazan, he will try every trick in book to get it.
Do not be fooled![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0038
rows.name:
Many thanks, friend! Deliver shipment to Bodada at
Nopon Bazaar in New LA and the job is finished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0039
rows.name:
Loma will try every trick in the book to get shipment.
Do not be fooled![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041101_MSG0040
rows.name:
Make sure that goods reach Bodada at
Nopon Bazaar in New LA.[ST:wait ]
